title: [Large-Scale] Gamification-Enhanced Financial Literacy Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Financial Management Concepts
context.additional_context: Corporate training environments where professionals learn via mobile devices outside work hours. Practical application skills are verified through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize core financial calculation formulas (e.g., budgeting, investment analysis) with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can complete five or more weekly financial concept quizzes through gamification elements.
Learners can submit capital management plans tailored to real corporate financial scenarios via team-based project evaluations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
